GE07bhg4c08u:2: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama |
GE07bhg4c08u:3: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate ||1||
GE07bhg4c08u:6: ity uktaṃ brahma-karmādi spaṣṭam aṣṭama ucyate ||
GE07bhg4c08u:7: pūrvādhyāyānte bhagavatopakṣiptānāṃ brahmādhyātmādi-saptānāṃ padarthānāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsur arjuna uvāca kiṃ tad brahmeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:9_0: madhusūdanaḥ - pūrvādhyāyānte te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07bhg4c08u:9_1: ity ādinā sārdha-ślokena sapta-padārthā jñeyatvena bhagavatā sūtritās teṣāṃ vṛtti-sthānīyo
GE07bhg4c08u:10: tatra sūtritāni sapta-vastūni viśeṣato bubhutsamānaḥ ślokābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:11: taj-jñeyatvenoktaṃ brahma kiṃ sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:12: evam ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya tasminn adhiṣṭhāne tiṣṭhatīty adhyātmaṃ kiṃ śrotrādikaraṇa-grāmo vā pratyak-caitanyaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:13: tathā karma cākhilam ity atra kiṃ karma yajña-rūpam anyad vā vijñāntaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi tanute 'pi ca iti śrutau dvaividhya-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:14: tava mama ca samatvāt kathaṃ tvaṃ māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkām apanudan sarva-puruṣebhya uttamasya sarvajñasya tava na kiṃcid ajñeyam iti saṃbodhanena sūcayati he puruṣottameti |
GE07bhg4c08u:15: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktaṃ pṛthivyādibhūtam adhikṛtya yat kiṃcit kāryam adhibhūta-padena vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ vā samastam eva kārya-jātam |
GE07bhg4c08u:17: adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate devatā-viṣayam anudhyānaṃ vā sarvadaivateṣv ādiyta-maṇḍalādiṣv anusyūtaṃ caitanyaṃ vā ||1||
GE07bhg4c08u:20: śuddhāṃ ca bhaktiṃ provāca dve gatī api cāsṭame ||
GE07bhg4c08u:22: atra teṣāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:23: atra dehe ko 'dhiyajño yajñādhiṣṭhātā, sa cāsmin dehe kathaṃ jñeya ity uttarasyānusaṅgī ||1-2||
GE07bhg4c08u:25: utkān pṛṣṭaḥ kramād vyākhyad brahmādīn harir aṣṭame |
GE07bhg4c08u:26: yoga-miśrāṃ ca śuddhāṃ ca bhakti-mārga-dvayaṃ tathā ||
GE07bhg4c08u:27: pūrvādhyāyānte mumukṣāṇāṃ jñeyatayoddiṣṭān brahmādīn saptārthān viboddhum arjunaḥ pṛcchati |
GE07bhg4c08u:28: kiṃ tad brahmeti kiṃ paramātma-caitanyaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:29: kiṃ jīvātma-caitanyaṃ vā tad brahmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:30: kim adhyātmam iti ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtyeti nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:31: śrotrādīndriya-vṛndaṃ vā sūkṣma-bhūta-vṛndaṃ vā tad iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:32: āvayos taulyāt kim iti māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ sambodhanaṃ he puruṣottameti |
GE07bhg4c08u:33: pareśatvāt tava sarvaṃ suviditaṃ na tu memeti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:34: adhibhūtaṃ ca kim iti bhūtāny adhikṛtyeti nirukter ghaṭyādi-kāryaṃ vā sthūla-śarīraṃ vā tad iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:35: adhidaivaṃ kim iti devatā-viṣayakam anudhyānaṃ vā samaṣṭir virāṭ vā tad iti ||1||
GE07bhg4c08u:41: atra dehe you yajño nivartate tasmin ko 'dhiyajño 'dhiṣṭhātā |
GE07bhg4c08u:42: prayojakaḥ phala-dātā ca ka ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:43: svarūpaṃ pṛṣṭvādhiṣṭhāna-prakāraṃ pṛcchati - kathaṃ kena prakāreṇāsāv asmin dehe sthito yajñam adhitiṣṭhantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:45: anta-kāle ca niyata-cittaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kathaṃ kenopāyena jñeyo 'si ||2||
GE07bhg4c08u:46: madhusūdanaḥ - adhiyajño yajñam adhigato devatātmā vā para-brahma vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:47: sa ca kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa cintanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:49: sarvathāpi sa kim asmin dehe vartate tato bahir vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:50: dehe cet sa ko 'tra buddhyādis tad-vyatirikto vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:52: kintu saprakāra eka eva praśna iti draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:53: parama-kāruṇikatvād āyāsenāpi sarvopadrava-nivārakasya bhagavato 'nāyāsena mat-sanehopadrava-nivāraṇam īṣatkaram ucitam eveti sūcayan sambodhayati he madhusūdaneti |
GE07bhg4c08u:54: prayāṇa-kāle ca sarva-karaṇa-grāma-vaiyāgryāc citta-samādhānānupapatteḥ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa niyatātmabhiḥ samāhita-cittairjñeyo 'sīty ukta-śaṅkā-sūcanārthaś cakāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:55: etat sarvaṃ sarvajñatvāt parama-kāruṇikatvāc ca śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ prati kathayety abhiprāyaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c08u:57: baladevaḥ - adhiyajñaḥ ka iti yajñam adhigata indrādir vā viṣṇur vā sa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:58: katham iti tasyādhiyajña-bhāvaḥ katham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:59: etat sarvaṃ mat-sandeha-nivāraṇaṃ taveṣatkaram iti bodhayituṃ sambodhanaṃ - he madhusūdaneti |
GE07bhg4c08u:60: prayāṇeti tadā sarvendriya-vyagratayā citta-samādhānāsmabhavād iti bhāvaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c08u:66: śrīdharaḥ - praśna-krameṇaivottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca akṣaram iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:69: paramaṃ yad akṣaraṃ jagato mūla-kāraṇaṃ tad braham |
GE07bhg4c08u:70: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:71: svasyaiva brahmaṇa evāṃśatayā jīva-rūpeṇa bhavanaṃ svabhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:72: sa evātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtvena vartamāno 'dhyātma-śabdenocyate ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:76: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajā ||
GE07bhg4c08u:78: tau bhūta-bhāvodbhavau karoti yo visargo devatoddeśena dravya-tyāga-rūpo yajñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:79: sarva-karmaṇām upalakṣaṇam etat sa ca karma-śabda-vācyaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:80: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ saptānāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:81: praśna-krameṇa hi nirṇaye praṣṭur abhīṣṭa-siddhir anāyāsena syādity abhiprāyavān bhagavān atra śloke praśna-trayaṃ krameṇa nirdhāritavān |
GE07bhg4c08u:82: evaṃ dvitīya-śloke 'pi praśna-trayaṃ tṛtīya-śloke tv ekam iti vibhāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:83: nirupādhikam eva brahmātra vivakṣitaṃ brahma-śabdena na tu sopādhikam iti prathama-praśnasyottaram āha - akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty avināśi aśnute vā sarvam iti sarva-vyāpakam |
GE07bhg4c08u:84_0: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇu ity ādy upakramya
GE07bhg4c08u:84_1: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryā-candramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ nānyad ato
GE07bhg4c08u:84_2: 'sti draṣṭṛ śrutir ityādi madhye parāmṛśya etasmin tu khalv akṣarae gārgy ākāśa otaś
GE07bhg4c08u:84_3: ca protaś ca ity upasaṃhṛtaṃ śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c08u:85: sarvopādhi-śūnyaṃ sarvasya praśāsitṛ, avyākṛtākāśāntasya kṛtsnasya prapañcasya dhārayitṛ |
GE07bhg4c08u:87: nirupādhikaṃ caitanyaṃ tad iha brahmeti vivakṣitam |
GE07bhg4c08u:89: paramaṃ sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-rūpaṃ praśāsanasya kṛtsna-jaḍa-varga-dhāraṇasya ca liṅgasya tatraivopapatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:91_0: na tv ihākṣara-śabdasya varṇa-mātre rūḍhatvāc chruti-liṅgādhikaraṇa-nyāya-mūlakena
GE07bhg4c08u:91_1: rūḍhir yogam apaharati iti nyāyena rathakāra-śabdena jāti-viśeṣavat-praṇavākhyam
GE07bhg4c08u:92: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahmeti ca pareṇa viśeṣaṇāt ānaarthakya-pratihatānāṃ viparītaṃ balābalam iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:93: varṣāsu rathakāra ādadhīta ity atra tu jāti-viśeṣe nāsty asambhava iti viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:94: ananyathā-siddhena tu liṅgena śruter bādhaḥ ākāśas tal-liṅgāt ity ādau vivṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:96: ananyathā-siddhena liṅgena śruter bādhe yatra yogaḥ sambhavati tatra sa eva gṛhyate mukhyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:97: yathājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭaiḥ stuvata ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c08u:99: yatra tu yogo 'pi na sambhavati tatra gauṇī vṛttir yathākāśa-prāṇādi-śabdeṣu | ākāśa-śabdasyāpi
GE07bhg4c08u:100: brahmaṇi ā samantāt kāśata iti yogaḥ sambhavatīti cet |
GE07bhg4c08u:102: tathā ca parāmarṣaṃ sūtraṃ prasiddheś ca (Vs 1.3.17) iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:104: tad evaṃ kiṃ tad brahmeti nirṇītam |
GE07bhg4c08u:106: yad akṣaraṃ brahmety uktaṃ tasyaiva svabhāvaḥ svo bhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ pratyak-caitanyaṃ na tu svasya bhāva iti ṣaṣṭhī-samāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:109: tasmān na brahmaṇaḥ saṃbandhi kintu brahma-svarūpam eva |
GE07bhg4c08u:110: ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtayā vartamānam adhyātmam ucyate 'dhyātma-śabdenābhidhīyate na karaṇa-grāma ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:111_0: yāga-dāna-homātmakaṃ vaidikaṃ karmaivātra karma-śabdena vivikṣitam iti tṛtīya-praśnottaram
GE07bhg4c08u:111_1: āha bhūtānāṃ bhavana-dharmakāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamānāṃ bhāvam utpattim udbhavaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:111_2: vṛddhiṃ ca karoti yo visargas tyāgasta-tac-chāstra-vihito yāga-dāna-homātmakaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c08u:113: tatra devatoddeśena dravya-tyāgo yāga uttiṣṭhad dhomo vaṣaṭ-kāra-prayogāntaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:119: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ || iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:120: te vā ete āhutī hute utkrāmataḥ ity ādi śruteś ca ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:122: na kṣaratīti akṣaraṃ nityaṃ yat paramaṃ tad brahma-- etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:123: svabhāvaḥ svātmānaṃ dehādhyāsa-vaśād bhāvayati janayatīti svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:124: yad vā svaṃ bhāvayati paramātmānaṃ prāpayatīti svabhāvaḥ śuddha-jīvo 'dhyātmam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:126: bhūtair eva bhāvānāṃ manuṣyādi-dehānām udbhavaṃ karotīti sa visargo jīvasya saṃsāraḥ karma-janyatvāt karma-saṃjñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:127: karma-śabdena jīvasya saṃsāra ucyata ity arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:128: baladevaḥ - evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān krameṇa saptānām uttaram āha akṣaram iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:129: na kṣaratīti nirkter akṣaraṃ yat paramaṃ dehādi-viviktaṃ jīvātma-caitanyaṃ tan mayā brahmety ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:130: tasyākṣara-śabdatvaṃ brahma-śabdatvaṃ ca-avyaktam akṣare līyate 'kṣaraṃ tamasi līyate tama ekībhavati parasminn iti vijñānaṃ brahma ced veda iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:132: svasya jīvātmanaḥ sambandhī yo bhāvo bhūta-sūkṣma-tad-vāsanā-lakṣaṇa-padārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:133: pañcāgni-vidyāyāṃ paṭhitas tad-ātmani saṃbadhyamānatvān mayādhyātmam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:134: bhūteti teṣāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ sthūlais taiḥ saṃpṛktānāṃ bhāvo manuṣyādi-lakṣaṇas tad-udbhava-karas tad-utpādako yo visargaḥ sa karma saṃjñitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:135_1: yaḥ karma-śeṣo bhuvi manuṣyādi-deha-lābhāya visṛṣṭas tan mayā karmocyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:136: chāndogye dyu-parjanya-pṛthivī-puruṣa-yoṣitsu pañcasv agniṣu śraddhā-soma-vṛṣṭy-anna-retāṃsi kramāt pañcāhutayaḥ paṭhyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:137: tatrāyam arthaḥ - vaidiko jīva iha loke 'smayāni dadhy-ādīni śraddhayā juhoti |
GE07bhg4c08u:138: tā dadhy-ādimayyaḥ pañcīkṛtatvāt pañca-bhūta-rūpā āpaḥ śraddhayā hutatvāt śraddhākhyāhuti-svarūpeṇa tasmin jīve saṃbaddhās tiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:142: hutāstāḥ soma-rājākhya-divya-dehatayā pariṇamante tena dehena sa tatra karma-phalāni bhuṅkte |
GE07bhg4c08u:143: tad-bhogāvasāne 'smayo jīvavān dehais tair devaiḥ parjanyāgnau huto vṛṣṭir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:144: vṛṣṭi-bhūtās tāḥ sajīvāḥ pṛthivy-agnau tair hutā brīhy-ādy-anna-bhāvaṃ labhante |
GE07bhg4c08u:145: anna-bhūtāḥ sajīvās tāḥ puruṣāgnau hutā reto-bhāvaṃ bhajante |
GE07bhg4c08u:146: reto-bhūtāḥ sa-jīvās tā yoṣid-agnau tair hutā garbhātmanā sthitā manuṣya-bhāvaṃ prayāntīti tad-bhāva-hetur anuśaya-śabda-vācyaḥ karma-śeṣaḥ karmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:147: evam evoktaṃ sūtrakṛtā tad-antara-pratipattau ity ādibhiḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c08u:154: bhūtaṃ prāṇi-mātram adhikṛtya bhavatīty adhibhūtam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:155: puruṣo vairājaḥ sūrya-maṇḍala-madhyavartī svāṃśa-bhūta-sarva-devatānām adhipatir adhidaivatam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:157: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:158: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:159: atrāsmin dehe 'ntaryāmitvena sthito 'ham evādhiyajño yajñādi-karma-pravartakas tat-phala-dātā ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:160: katham ity asyāpy uttaram anenaivoktaṃ bhraṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:161: antaryāmiṇo 'saṅgatvādibhir guṇair jīva-vailakṣaṇyena dehāntarvartitvasya prasiddhatvāt | tathā ca śrutiḥ-
GE07bhg4c08u:166: deha-bhṛtāṃ madhye śreṣṭheti sambodhayaṃs tvam apy evambhūtam antaryāmiṇaṃ parādhīna-sva-pravṛtti-nivṛtty-anvaya-vyatirekābhyāṃ boddhum arhasīti sūcayati ||4||
GE07bhg4c08u:167: madhusūdanaḥ - sampraty agrima-praśna-trayasyottaram āha adhibhūtam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:168: kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī bhāvo yat kiṃcij janimad vastu bhūtaṃ prāṇi-jātam adhikṛtya bhavatīty adhibhūtam ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:169_0: puruṣo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samaṣṭi-liṅgātmā vyaṣṭi-sarva-karaṇānugrāhakaḥ ātmaivedam agra
GE07bhg4c08u:169_1: āsīt puruṣavidhaḥ ity upakramya sa yat pūrvo 'smāt sarvasvmāt sarvān pāpmana auṣattasmāt
GE07bhg4c08u:170: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:173: adhidaivataṃ daivatāny ādityādīn adhikṛtya cakṣur-ādi-karaṇāny anugṛhṇātīti |
GE07bhg4c08u:175: sarva-yajñābhimāninī viṣṇv-ākhyā devatā yajño vai viṣṇuḥ iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:176: sa ca viṣṇur adhiyajño 'haṃ vāsudeva eva na mad-bhinnaḥ kaścit |
GE07bhg4c08u:177: ataeva para-brahmaṇaḥ sakāśād atyantābhedenaiva pratipattavya iti katham iti vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c08u:178: sa cātrāsmin manuṣya-dehe yajña-rūpeṇa vartate buddhyādi-vyatirikto viṣṇu-rūpatvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:179: etena sa kim asmin dehe tato bahir vā dehe cet ko 'tra buddhyādis tad vyatirikto veti sandeho nirastaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:181: puruṣo vai yajñaḥ puruṣas tena yajño yad enaṃ puruṣas tanute ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:182: he deha-bhṛtāṃ vara sarva-prāṇināṃ śreṣṭheti sambodhayan pratikṣaṇaṃ mat-sambhāṣaṇāt kṛtakṛtyas tvam etad-bodha-yogyo 'sīti protsāhayaty arjunaṃ bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c08u:184: viśvanāthaḥ --- kṣaro naśvaro bhāvaḥ padārtho ghaṭa-paṭādir adhibhūtam adhibhūta-śabda-vācyaḥ puruṣaḥ samaṣṭi-virāḍ-adhidaivata-śabda-vācyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:185: adhikṛtya vartamānāni sūryādi-daivatāni yatra iti tan-nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:186_0: atra dehe 'dhiyajño yajñādi-karma-pravartako 'ntaryāmy ahaṃ mad-aṃśakatvād aham evety
GE07bhg4c08u:186_1: eva-kāreṇa kathaṃ jñeya ity asyottaram antaryāmitve 'ham eva mad-abhinnatve naiva
GE07bhg4c08u:186_2: jñeyo na tu adhyātmādir ive mad-bhinnatvenety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:187: dehe deha-bhṛtāṃ vareti tvaṃ tu sākṣān mat-sakhatvāt sarva-śreṣṭha eva bhavasīti bhāvaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c08u:189: kṣaraḥ pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmī bhāvaḥ sthūlo dehaḥ sa mayādhibhūtam it ucyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:191: puruṣaḥ samaṣṭi-virāṭ sa mayādhidaivam ity ucyate adhikṛtya vartamānāny ādityādīni daivatāny atreti vyutpatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:192: atra dehe 'dhiyajño yajñam adhikṛtya vartata iti vyutpattes tat-pravartakas tat-phala-pradaś cāham eva |
GE07bhg4c08u:195: anena katham ity asyāpy uttaram uktaṃ prādeśa-mātra-vapustvenāntar-niyamayann ahaṃ yajñādi-pravartaka ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:196: tathā ca mad-arcā-sevanād etān brahmādīn saptārthān svarūpato ' śrameṇa vindatīti |
GE07bhg4c08u:200: anta-kāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram |
GE07bhg4c08u:201: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c08u:202: śrīdharaḥ - prayāṇa-kāle ca jñāyo 'sīty anena pṛṣṭam anta-kāle jñānopāyaṃ tat-phalaṃ ca darśayati anta-kāla iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:203: mām evokta-lakṣaṇam antaryāmi-rūpaṃ parameśvaraṃ smaran dehaṃ tyaktvā yaḥ prakarṣeṇārcir-ādi-mārgeṇottarāyaṇa-pathā yāti sa mad-bhāvaṃ mad-rūpatāṃ yāti |
GE07bhg4c08u:207: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ prayāṇa-kāle ca kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīti saptamasya praśnasyottaram āha anta-kāle ceti |
GE07bhg4c08u:208_0: mām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam adhiyajñaṃ sa-guṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ vā paramam akṣaraṃ brahma
GE07bhg4c08u:208_1: na tv adhyātmādikaṃ smaran sadā cintayaṃs tat-saṃskāra-pāṭavāt samasta-karaṇa-grāma-vaiyagryavaty
GE07bhg4c08u:208_2: anta-kāle 'pi smaran kalevaraṃ muktvā śarīre 'haṃ-mamābhimānaṃ tyaktvā prāṇa-viyoga-kāle
GE07bhg4c08u:208_3: yaḥ prayāti sa-guṇa-dhyāna-pakṣe 'gnijyotir-ahaḥ-śukla ity ādi-vacyamāṇena deva-yāna-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:208_4: pitṛ-yāna-mārgāt prakarṣeṇa yāti sa upāsako mad-bhāvaṃ mad-rūpatāṃ nirguṇa-brahma-bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:209: nirguṇa-brahma-smaraṇa-pakṣe tu kalevaraṃ tyaktvā prayātīti loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyaṃ na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanty atraiva samavanīyante iti śrutes
GE07bhg4c08u:211: sa mad-bhāvaṃ sākṣād eva yāti brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti (BAU 4.4.6) iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:212: nāsty atra deha-vyatirikta ātmani mad-bhāva-prāptau vā saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:214: deha-vyatireke 'pi īśvarād bhinno na veti sandeho na vidyate chidyante sarva-saṃśayāḥ (MuṇḍU 2.2.8) iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:215: atra ca kalevaraṃ muktvā prayātīti dehād bhinnatvaṃ mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti ceśvarād abhinnatvaṃ jīvasyoktam iti draṣṭavyam ||5||
GE07bhg4c08u:216: viśvanāthaḥ --- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anta-kāle ceti |
GE07bhg4c08u:217: mām eva smarann iti mat-smaraṇam eva maj-jñānam |
GE07bhg4c08u:218: na tu ghaṭa-paṭādir ivāhaṃ kenāpi tattvato jñātuṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:220: baladevaḥ -- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anteti |
GE07bhg4c08u:221: atra smaraṇātmakena jñānena jñeyo bhavan-mad-bhāvopalambhanaṃ ca tat phalaṃ prayacchāmīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:226: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram |
GE07bhg4c08u:227: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c08u:228: śrīdharaḥ - na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ prāpnotīti niyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:230: yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ devatāntaraṃ vānyam api vānta-kāle smaran dehaṃ tyajati taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c08u:232: sadā tad-bhāva-bhāvita iti sarvadā tasya bhāvo bhāvanā anucintanam |
GE07bhg4c08u:234_0: madhusūdanaḥ - anta-kāle bhagavantam anudhyāyato bhagavat-prāptir niyateti vaditum
GE07bhg4c08u:234_1: anyad api yatkiṃcid api yat kiṃcit tat-kāle dhyāyato dehaṃ tyajatas tat-prāptir avaśyambhāvinīti
GE07bhg4c08u:235_0: na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ kiṃ tarhi yaṃ yaṃ cāpi bhāvaṃ devatā-viśeṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:235_1: ca-kārād anyad api yat kiṃcid vā smaraṃś cintayann ante prāṇa-viyoga-kāle kalevaraṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:235_2: tyajati sa taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvam eva nānyam eti prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c08u:237: tena cāvaśyānugrāhyatvaṃ tena ca pratāraṇāśaṅkā-śūnyatvam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:238_0: anta-kāle smaraṇodyamāsambhave 'pi pūrvābhyāsa-janitā vāsanaiva smṛti-hetur ity āha
GE07bhg4c08u:238_1: - sadā sarvadā tasmin devatā-viśeṣādau bhāvo bhāvanā vāsanā tad-bhāvaḥ sa bhāvitaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:238_2: sampādito yena sa tathā bhāvita-tad-bhāva ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:240: tad-bhāvena tac-cintanena bhāvito vāsita-citta iti vā ||6||
GE07bhg4c08u:241: viśvanāthaḥ --- mām eva smaran māṃ prāpnotītivan mad-anyam api smaran mad-anyam eva prāpnotīty āha yaṃ yam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:242: tasya bhāvena bhāvanenānucintanena bhāvito vāsitas tan-mayī-bhūtaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c08u:243: baladevaḥ - na ca mat-smarteiva mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:244: kintv anya-smartāpy anya-bhāvaṃ yātīty āha yaṃ yam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:247: yathā bharato dehānte mṛgaṃ cintayan mṛgo 'bhūt |
GE07bhg4c08u:248: antima-smṛtiś ca pūrva-smṛti-viṣayaiva bhavatīty āha sadeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:252: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:255: na tu tadā vivaśasya smaraṇodyamo sambhavati tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:257: satataṃ smaraṇaṃ ca citta-śuddhiṃ vinā na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:260: evaṃ mayy arpitaṃ manaḥ saṅkalpātmakaṃ buddhiś ca vyavasāyātmikāyena tvayā sa tvaṃ māme va prāpsyasi |
GE07bhg4c08u:262: madhusūdanaḥ - yasmād evaṃ pūrva-smaraṇābhyāsa-janitāntyā bhāvanaiva tadānīṃ paravaśasya dehāntara-prāptau kāraṇaṃ tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:263: tasmān mad-viṣayakāntya-bhāvanotpatty-arthaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu pūrvam evādareṇa māṃ saguṇam īśvaram anusmara cintaya |
GE07bhg4c08u:264: yady antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-vaśān na śaknoṣi satatam anusmartuṃ tato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhaye yudhya ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:267_1: saṅkalpādhyavasāya-lakṣaṇe mano-buddhī yena tvayā sa tvam īdṛśaḥ sarvadā mac-cintana-paraḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:269: idaṃ ca saguṇa-brahma-cintanam upāsakānām uktaṃ teṣām antya-bhāvanā-sāpekṣatvāt
GE07bhg4c08u:270: | nirguṇa-brahma-jñānināṃ tu jñāna-sama-kālam evājñāna-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇāyā mukteḥ siddhatvān nāsty antya-bhāvanāpekṣeti draṣṭavyam ||7||
GE07bhg4c08u:272: baladevaḥ - yasmāt pūrva-smṛtir evāntima-smṛti-hetus tasmāt tvaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ mām anusmara yudhyasva ca loka-saṅgrahāya yuddhādīni svocitāni karmāṇi kuru |
GE07bhg4c08u:273: evaṃ mayy arpitamanobuddhis tvaṃ mām evaiṣyasi, na tv anyad iy atra sandehas te mābhūt ||7||
GE07bhg4c08u:278: śrīdharaḥ - santata-smaraṇasya cābhyāso 'ntaraṅga-sādhanam iti darśayann āha abhyāsa-yogeneti |
GE07bhg4c08u:282: ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya |
GE07bhg4c08u:284: divyaṃ dyotanātmakaṃ paramaṃ puruṣaṃ parameśvaram anucintayan he pārtha tam eva yātīti ||8||
GE07bhg4c08u:285: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evaṃ saptānām api praśnānām uttaram uktvā prayāṇa-kāle bhagavad-anusmaraṇasya bhagavat-prāpti-lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ vivarītum ārabhate abhyāseti |
GE07bhg4c08u:286: abhyāsaḥ sajātīya-pratyaya-pravāho mayi vijātīya-pratyayānantaritaḥ ṣaṣṭhe prāg vyākhyātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:287_0: sa eva yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktaṃ tatraiva vyāpṛtam ātmākāra-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ yac cetas
GE07bhg4c08u:287_1: tena cetasābhyāsa-pāṭavena nānya-gāminā nānyatra viṣayāntare nirodha-prayatnaṃ vināpi
GE07bhg4c08u:287_2: gantuṃ śīlam asyeti tena paramaṃ niratiśayaṃ puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ divyaṃ divi dyotanātmany
GE07bhg4c08u:287_3: āditye bhavaṃ yaś cāsāv āditye iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:291: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmāt smaraṇābhyāsina evānta-kāle svata eva mat-smaraṇaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:292: tena ca māṃ prāpnotīty ataś cetaso mat-smaraṇam eva paramo yoga ity āha abhyāsa-yoga iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:293: abhyāso mat-smaraṇasya punaḥ punar āvṛttir eva yogas tad-yuktena cetasā,
GE07bhg4c08u:294: ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tena |
GE07bhg4c08u:296: baladevaḥ - sārvadikī smṛtir evāntima-smṛtikarīty evaṃ draḍhayati abhyāsenti |
GE07bhg4c08u:298: tato 'nyatrācalatā tad ekāgreṇa cetasā divyaṃ puruṣaṃ paramaṃ sa-śrīkaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ vāsudevam anucintayan tam eva kīṭa-bhṛṅga-nyāyena tat-tulāḥ san yāti labhate ||8||
GE07bhg4c08u:305: śrīdharaḥ - punar apy anucintanīyaṃ puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:308: aṇoḥ sūkṣmād apy aṇīyāṃsaṃ atisūkṣmam ākāśa-kāla-digbhyo 'py atisūkṣmataram |
GE07bhg4c08u:311: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt iti śruteḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c08u:312: madhusūdanaḥ - punar api tam evānucintayitavyaṃ gantavyaṃ ca puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:314: purāṇaṃ cirantanaṃ sarva-kāraṇatvād anādim iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c08u:316: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ sūkṣād apy ākāśādeḥ sūkṣmataraṃ tad-upādānatvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:317: sarvasya karma-phala-jātasya dhātāraṃ vicitratayā prāṇibhyo vibhaktāraṃ phalam ata upapatteḥ iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:318: na cintayituṃ śakyam aparimitam ahimatvena rūpaṃ yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c08u:319: ādityasyeva sakala-jagad-avabhāsako varṇaḥ prakāśo yasya taṃ sarvasya jagato 'vabhāsakam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c08u:320: ataeva tamasaḥ parastāt tamaso mohāndhakārād ajñāna-lakṣaṇāt parastāt prakāśa-rūpatvena tamo-virodhinam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c08u:321: anusmarec cintayed yaḥ kaścid api sa taṃ yātīti pūrveṇaiva
GE07bhg4c08u:322: sambandhaḥ | sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam iti pareṇa vā sambandhaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c08u:323: viśvanāthaḥ --- yogābhyāsaṃ vinā manaso viṣaya-grāmān nivṛttir durghaṭā |
GE07bhg4c08u:324: yac ca vinā sātatyena bhagavat-smaraṇam api durghaṭam iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:325: kenacit yogābhyāsena sahitaiva bhaktiḥ kriyata iti tāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim iti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:326: kaviṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvajño 'py anyaḥ sanakādiḥ sārvakāliko na bhavaty ata āha purāṇam anādiṃ sarvajño 'nādir apy antaryāmī sa bhakty-upadeṣṭā na bhavaty ata āha anuśāsitāram |
GE07bhg4c08u:328: tādṛśa-kṛpālur api sudurvijñeya-tattva eva ity āha aṇoḥ sakāśād apy aṇīyāṃsam |
GE07bhg4c08u:329: tarhi sa kiṃ jīva iva paramāṇu-pramāṇas tatrāha sarvasya dhātāraṃ sarva-vastu-mātra-dhārakatvena sarva-vyāpakatvāt paraṃ mahā-parimāṇam apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:331: madhyama-parimāṇam api tasyānanya-prakāśyatvam āha āditya-varṇam ādityavat sva-para-prakāśako varṇaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya |
GE07bhg4c08u:332: tathā tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ parastāt vartamānaṃ māyā-śaktimantam api māyātīta-svarūpam ity arthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c08u:333: baladevaḥ - yogād ṛte cetaso 'nanya-gāmitā duṣkareti yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim ity ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:336: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ tena cāṇum api jīvam antaḥ praviśatīti siddham |
GE07bhg4c08u:337: āha caivaṃ śrutiḥ antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:340: nanu katham evaṃ saṅgacchate tatrāha acintya-rūpaṃ avitarkya-svarūpaṃ ekam eva brahma puruṣa-vidhatvena madhyama-parimāṇam aṇor aṇīyāṃsam ity ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:344: sva-parakāśatām āha ādityeti sūryavat sva-para-prakāśakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:348: etādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'nukṣaṇaṃ smaret sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti iti pareṇānvayaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c08u:354: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam ||10||
GE07bhg4c08u:357: evaṃbhūtaṃ puruṣam anta-kāle bhakti-yukto niścalena vikṣepa-rahitena manasā yo 'nusmaret |
GE07bhg4c08u:359: yoga-balena samyak suṣumṇā mārgeṇa bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:360: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣaṃ paramātma-svarūpaṃ divyaṃ dyotanātmakaṃ prāpnoti ||10||
GE07bhg4c08u:361: madhusūdanaḥ - kadā tad-anusmaraṇe pratrātireko 'bhyavartate tad āha prayāneti |
GE07bhg4c08u:362: prayāṇa-kāle 'nta-kāle 'calenaikāgreṇa manasā taṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'nusmared ity anuvartate |
GE07bhg4c08u:363: kīdṛśaḥ bhaktyā parameśvara-viṣayeṇa parameṇa premṇā yuktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:364: yogasya samādher balena taj-janita-saṃskāra-samūhena vyutthāna-saṃskāra-virodhinā ca yuktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:365_0: evaṃ prathamaṃ hṛdaya-puṇḍarīke vaśīkṛtya tata ūrdhva-gāminyā suṣumṇayā nāḍyā gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:365_1: bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya sthāpayitvā samyag apramatto
GE07bhg4c08u:365_2: brahma-randhrād utkrāmya sa evam upāsakas taṃ kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram ity-ādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:365_3: paraṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ dyotanātmakam upaiti pratipadyate ||10 ||
GE07bhg4c08u:366: viśvanāthaḥ --- prayāṇa-kāle 'nta-kāle 'calena niścalena manasā yā satata-smaraṇa-mayī bhaktis tayā yuktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:370: baladevaḥ -- yo jano bhaktyā paramātma-premṇā yoga-balena samādhi-janita-saṃskāra-nicayena ca yuktaḥ prayāṇa-kāle maraṇa-samaye 'calenaikāgreṇa manasā taṃ puruṣam anusmaret |
GE07bhg4c08u:372: bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya saṃsthāpya samyak sāvadhānaḥ san sa taṃ puruṣam upaiti ||10||
GE07bhg4c08u:379: śrīdharaḥ - kevalād abhyāsa-yogād api praṇavā̆bhyāsam antaraṅgaṃ vidhitsuḥ pratijānīte-yad akṣaram iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:381: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:384: yac ca jñātum icchanto gurukule brahmacaryaṃ caranti |
GE07bhg4c08u:385: tat te tubhyaṃ padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:388: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ yena kenacid abhidhānena dhyāna-kāle bhagavad-anusmaraṇe prāpte-
GE07bhg4c08u:392: tatte padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om ity etat || (KaṭhaU 1.2.15)
GE07bhg4c08u:393: ity ādi-śruti-pratipāditatvena praṇavenaivābhidhānena tad-anusmaraṇaṃ kartavyaṃ nānyena mantrādineti niyantum upakramate yad akṣaram iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:394_0: yad akṣaram avināśi oṅkārākhyaṃ brahma veda-vido vadanti etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi
GE07bhg4c08u:394_1: brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam aṇv ahrasvam adīrgham ity ādi-vacanaiḥ sarva-viśeṣa-nivartanena pratipādayanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:395_0: pramāṇa-kuśalair eva pratipannaṃ kiṃ tu muktopasṛpyatayā tair apy anubhūtam ity āha-viśanti
GE07bhg4c08u:395_1: svarūpatayā samyag-darśanena yad akṣaraṃ yatayo yatna-śīlāḥ saṃnyāsino vīta-rāgā niḥspṛhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:396_0: na kevalaṃ siddhair anubhūtaṃ sādhakānām api sarvo 'pi prayāsas tad-artha ity āha
GE07bhg4c08u:396_1: yad-icchanto jñātuṃ naiṣṭhikā brahmacāriṇo brahmacaryaṃ gurukula-vāsādi-tapaś caranti
GE07bhg4c08u:396_2: yāvaj-jīvaṃ tad akṣarākhyaṃ padaṃ padanīyaṃ te tubhyaṃ saṅgraheṇa saṅkṣepeṇāhaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:397: pravakṣye prakarṣeṇa kathayiṣyāmi yathā tava bodho bhavati tathā |
GE07bhg4c08u:398: atas tad akṣaraṃ kathaṃ mayā jñeyam ity ākulo mā bhūr ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:399_0: atra ca parasya brahmaṇo vācaka-rūpeṇa pratimāvat-pratīka-rūpeṇa ca yaḥ punar etaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:399_1: trimātreṇom ity aneaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam abhidhyāyīta sa tam adhigacchati ity
GE07bhg4c08u:399_2: ādi-vacanair manda-madhyama-buddhīnāṃ krama-mukti-phalakam upāsanam uktaṃ tad evehāpi
GE07bhg4c08u:400: ato yoga-dhāraṇā-sahitam oṅkāropāsanaṃ tat phalaṃ sva-svarūpaṃ tato 'punar-āvṛttis tan-mārgaś cety artha-jātam ucyate yāvad adhyāya-samāpti ||11||
GE07bhg4c08u:401: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya ity etāvan mātroktyā yogo na jñāyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:405: kiṃ vā prāpyam ity api saṅkṣepeṇa brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:406: yad evākṣaram om ity ekākṣara-vācyaṃ brahma yatayo viśanti tat padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:407: samyaktayā gṛhayte 'neneti saṅgrahas tad-upāyas tena saha pravakṣye śṛṇu ||11||
GE07bhg4c08u:408: baladevaḥ -- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyaitāvatā yogo nāvagamyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:409: tasmāt tasya prakāraṃ tatra japyaṃ prāpyaṃ brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad akṣaram iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:410: ekam eva brahma akṣaram om iti vācakaṃ vadanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:411: vīta-rāgā vinaṣṭāvidyā yatayo yad brahma tad-vācya-bhūtaṃ vijñānaika-rasaṃ viśanti prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:412: tad-ubhaya-r”paṃ brahma jñātum icchanto naiṣṭhikā gurukula-vasādi-lakṣaṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caranti |
GE07bhg4c08u:413: tat padaṃ prāpyaṃ saṅgraheṇopāyena saha pravakṣye vakṣyāmi yathānāyasena tvaṃ tad-vidyāṃ prāpnuyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:414: samyag gṛhyate tattvam anena iti nirukteḥ saṅgraha upāyaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c08u:417: sarva-dvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:419: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran |
GE07bhg4c08u:420: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||13||
GE07bhg4c08u:421: śrīdharaḥ - pratijñātam upāyaṃ sāṅgam āha dvābhyāṃ sarveti |
GE07bhg4c08u:426: mūrdhni bhruvor madhye prāṇam ādhāya yogasya dhāraṇāṃ sthairyam āsthitaḥ āśritavān san ||12||
GE07bhg4c08u:428: om ity ekaṃ yad akṣaraṃ tad eva brahma-vācakatvād vā pratimādivad brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma |
GE07bhg4c08u:429: tad-vyāharan uccārayaṃs tad-vācyaṃ ca mām anusmarann eva dehaṃ tyajan yaḥ prakarṣeṇa yāti arcirādi-mārgeṇa sa paramāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ mad-gatiṃ yāti prāpnoti ||13||
GE07bhg4c08u:430: madhusūdanaḥ - tatra pravakṣya iti pratijñātam arthaṃ sopakaraṇam āhaa dvābhyām sarva-dvārāṇīti |
GE07bhg4c08u:431: sarvāṇīndriya-dvārāṇi saṃyamya sva-sva-viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya viṣaya-doṣa-darśanābhyāsāt tad-vimukhatām āpāditaiḥ śrotrādibhiḥ śabdādi-viṣaya-grahaṇam akurvan |
GE07bhg4c08u:432: bāheyndriya-nirodhe 'pi manasaḥ pracāraḥ syād ity ata āha mano hṛdi nirudhya ca,
GE07bhg4c08u:433: abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhe vyākhyātābhyāṃ hṛdaya-deśe mano nirudhya nirvṛttikatām āpādya ca,
GE07bhg4c08u:434: antar api viṣaya-cintām akurvann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:435_0: evaṃ bahir antar upalabdhi-dvārāṇi sarvāṇi saṃnirudhya kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇam api sarvato
GE07bhg4c08u:435_1: nigṛhya bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa mūrdhny ādhāya bhruvor madhye tad-upari ca gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇāveśyātmano
GE07bhg4c08u:437: om ity ekam akṣaraṃ brahma-vācakatvāt pratimā-baddha-brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma vyāharann uccaran |
GE07bhg4c08u:438: om iti vyāharann ity etāvataiva nirvāha ekākṣaram ity anāyāsa-kathanena stuty-artham |
GE07bhg4c08u:439: om iti vyāharann ekākṣaram ekam advitīyam akṣaram avināśi sarva-vyāpakaṃ brahma mām om ity asyārthaṃ smarann iti vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:440_0: tena praṇavaṃ japaṃs tad-abhidheya-bhūtaṃ ca māṃ cintayan mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā dehaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:440_1: tyajanyaḥ prayāti sa yāti deva-yāna-mārgeṇa brahma-lokaṃ gatvā tad-bhogānte paramāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:442: samādhi-lābhaḥ ity uktvā īśvara-praṇidhānād vā (1.23) ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:443: praṇidhānaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ (1.27), taj-japas tad-artha-bhāvanam (1.28) iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:445: iha tu sākṣād eva tataḥ parama-gati-lābha ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:446: tasmād avirodhayom ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmarann ātmano yoga-dhāraṇām āsthita iti vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c08u:448_0: viśvanāthaḥ --- uktam arthaṃ vadan yoge prakāram āha sarvāṇi cakṣur-ādīndriya-dvārāṇi
GE07bhg4c08u:448_1: saṃyamya bāhya-viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya manaś ca hṛdy eva nirudhya viṣayāntareṣv asaṅkalpya
GE07bhg4c08u:448_2: mūrdhni bhruvor madhye eva prāṇam ādhāya yoga-dhāraṇām ānakha-śikha-man-mūrti-bhāvanām
GE07bhg4c08u:448_3: āśritaḥ san om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma-svarūpaṃ vyāharan uccārayan tad-vācyaṃ mām anusmarann
GE07bhg4c08u:450_0: sarvāṇi bahir jñāna-dvārāṇi śrotrādīni saṃyamya śabdādibhyo viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya
GE07bhg4c08u:450_1: doṣa-darśanābhyāsena tad-vimukhais tais tān gṛhṇan śrotrādi-saṃyame 'pi manaḥ pracared
GE07bhg4c08u:450_2: ity ata āha hṛdi sthite mayi antar-jñāna-dvāraṃ mano nirudhya niveśya manasāpi tān smaran |
GE07bhg4c08u:451_0: atha kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇaṃ ca mūrdhnādhāyādau hṛt-padme vaśīkṛtya tasmād ūrdhva-gatayā
GE07bhg4c08u:451_1: suṣumṇayā gurūpadiṣṭa-vartmanā bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye tad-upari brahma-randhre
GE07bhg4c08u:451_2: ca saṃsthāpya ātmano mama yoga-dhāraṇām āāda-śikhaṃ mad-bhāvanam āsthitaḥ kurvan |
GE07bhg4c08u:452_0: om iti vācakaṃ brahma tatra vyāharan antar uccārayan tat stauti ekākṣaram iti ekaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:452_1: pradhānaṃ ca tad-akṣaram avināśi ceti tathā tad vācyaṃ māṃ parmātmānam anusmaran
GE07bhg4c08u:452_2: dhyāyan yo dehaṃ tyajan prayāti sa paramāṃ gatiṃ mat-sālokyatāṃ yāti ||12-13 ||
GE07bhg4c08u:455: ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:457: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ cānta-kāle dhāraṇayā mat-prāptir nityābhyāsavata eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:461: yo māṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśaḥ pratidinaṃ smarati |
GE07bhg4c08u:462: tasya nitya-yuktasya samāhitasyāhaṃ sukhena labhyo 'smi nānyasya ||14||
GE07bhg4c08u:463_0: madhusūdanaḥ - ya evaṃ vāyu-nirodha-vaidhuryeṇa prāṇam āveśya mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā dehaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:463_1: tyaktuṃ svecchayā na śaknoti kiṃ tu karma-kṣayeṇaiva paravaśo dehaṃ tyajati tasya
GE07bhg4c08u:463_2: kiṃ syād iti tad āha ananya-cetā iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:464_0: na vidyate mad-anya-viṣaye ceto yasya so 'nanya-cetāḥ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśo
GE07bhg4c08u:464_1: yāvaj-jīvaṃ yo māṃ smarati tasya sva-vaśatayā vā dehaṃ tyajato 'pi nitya-yuktasya
GE07bhg4c08u:464_2: satata-samāhita-cittasya yoginaḥ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyo 'haṃ parameśvara itareṣām
GE07bhg4c08u:464_3: atidurlabho 'pi he pārtha tavāham atisulabho mā bhaiṣīr ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:468: satatam iti nairantaryaṃ nityaśa iti dīrgha-kālatvaṃ smaraṇasyoktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:471: tatra sa ity abhyāsa ukto 'pi smaraṇa-paryavasāyī |
GE07bhg4c08u:472: tena yāvaj-jīvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikṣepāntara-śūnyatayā bhagavad-anucintanam eva parama-gati-hetur mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā tu svecchayā prāṇotkramaṇaṃ bhavatu na veti nātīvāgrahaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c08u:473: viśvanāthaḥ --- tad evam ārtaḥ ity ādinā karma-miśrām,
GE07bhg4c08u:475: kaviṃ purāṇaṃ ity ādibhir yoga-miśrāṃ ca saparikarāṃ pradhānībhūtāṃ bhaktim uktvā sarva-śreṣṭhāṃ nirguṇāṃ kevalāṃ bhaktim āha-ananya-cetā iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:478: tathā svargāpargādāv api prāpyatvena ceto yasya |
GE07bhg4c08u:479: satataṃ sadeti kāla-deśa-pātra-śuddhy-ādy-anapekṣatayaiva nityaśaḥ pratidinam eva yo māṃ smarati,
GE07bhg4c08u:480: yasya tena bhaktenāhaṃ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:482: nitya-yuktasya nitya-mad-yogākāṅkṣiṇa āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ceti bhāviny api yoga āśāṃsite kta-pratyayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:486: baladevaḥ - evaṃ mokṣa-mātra-kāṅkṣiṇāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim upadiśya sva-jñānināṃ svam evākāṅkṣatām eka-bhaktir ity uktāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ upadiśati ananyeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:487_0: yo jano 'nanya-cetā na matto 'nyasmin karma-yogādike sādhane svarga-mokṣādike sādhye
GE07bhg4c08u:487_1: vā ceto yasya sa mad-ekābhilāṣavān satataṃ sarvadā deśa-kālādi-viśuddhi-nairapekṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:487_2: nityaśaḥ pratyahaṃ māṃ yaśodā-stanandhayaṃ nṛsiṃha-raghunāthādi-rūpeṇa bahudhāvirbhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:487_3: sarveśvaram atimātra-priyaṃ smaraty arcana-japādiṣv anusandhatte tasyāhaṃ tat-prītijñaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:488: tasyeti sambandha-sāmānye ṣaṣṭhī, na lokāvyaya ity ādinā kartari tasyāḥ pratiṣedhāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:489: tādṛśasya tasya viyogam asahiṣṇur aham eva tam ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:491: śrutiś caivam āha - yam evaiṣa vṛnute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā viviṛṇute tanūṃ svām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:492: svayaṃ ca vakṣyati - dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c08u:494: sarvadā mad-yogaṃ vāñchataḥ āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ca iti sūtrād āśāṃsite yoge bhaviṣyaty api kta-pratyayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:498: mām upetya punar janma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam |
GE07bhg4c08u:500: śrīdharaḥ - yady evaṃ tvaṃ sulabho 'si tataḥ kiṃ ? ata āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:501: ukta-lakṣaṇā mahātmāno mad-bhaktā māṃ prāpya punar duḥkhāśrayam antiyaṃ ca janma na prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:502: yatas te paramāṃ samyak siddhiṃ mokṣam eva prāptāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:503: punar janmano duḥkhānāṃ cālayaṃ sthānaṃ te mām upetya na prāpnuvantīti vā ||15||
GE07bhg4c08u:504: madhusūdanaḥ - bhagavantaṃ prāptāḥ punar āvartante na veti sandehe nāvartanta ity āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:505: mām īśvaraṃ prāpya punar janma manuṣyādi-deha-sambandhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ duḥkhālayaṃ garbha-vāsa-yoni-dvāra-nirgamanādy-aneka-duḥkha-sthānam |
GE07bhg4c08u:506: aśāśvatam asthiraṃ dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-prāyaṃ nāpnuvanti punar nāvartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:507: yato mahātmnāno rajas-tamo-mala-rahitāntaḥ-karaṇā śuddha-sattvāḥ samutpanna-samyag-darśanā mal-loka-bhogānte paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ muktiṃ gatās te |
GE07bhg4c08u:508: atra māṃ prāpya siddhiṃ gatā iti vadatopāsakānāṃ krama-muktir darśitā ||15||
GE07bhg4c08u:509: viśvanāthaḥ --- tvāṃ prāptavatas tasya kiṃ syād ity āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:511: aśāśvatam anityaṃ ca janma nāpnuvanti kintu sukha-pūrṇaṃ janma maj-janma-tulyaṃ prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:512: śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ sadānanaḥ sanātanaḥ ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:513: yadā vasudeva-gṛhe sukha-pūrṇaṃ nitya-bhūtam aprākṛtaṃ maj-janma bhavet tad eva teṣāṃ mad-bhaktānām api man-nitya-saṅgināṃ janma syān nānyadā iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:514: paramām iti anye bhaktāḥ saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnuvanti ananya-cetasas tu paramāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ mal-līlā-parikaratām ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:516: baladevaḥ -- tāṃ labdhavataḥ kiṃ phalaṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:517: mām ukta-lakṣaṇam upetya prāpya punaḥ prapañce janma nāpnuvanti nāvartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:519: aśāśvatam anityaṃ dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-prāyam śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:520: yatas te paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ gatiṃ mām eva gatā labdhavantaḥ avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim iti vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c08u:521_1: bhaktāyatta-sarvasvaṃ māṃ vinānyat sārṣṭyādikam agaṇayanto made-eka-jīvātavo bhavanty
GE07bhg4c08u:521_2: atas te mām eva saṃsiddhiṃ gatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:527: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma na vidyate ||16||
GE07bhg4c08u:528: śrīdharaḥ - sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:529: mad-bhaktās tu tadvan na jāyanta ity āha ā-brahmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:531: madhusūdanaḥ - bhagavantam upāgatānāṃ samyag-darśinām apunar-āvṛttau kathitāyāṃ tato vimukhānām asamyag-darśināṃ punar-āvṛttir artha-siddhety āha ābrahmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:532: ābrahma-bhuvanāt bhavanty atra bhūtānīti bhuvanaṃ lokaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:534: brahma-lokena saha sarve 'pi lokā mad-vimukhānām asamyag-darśināṃ bhoga-bhūtayaḥ punar-āvartinaḥ punar-āvartana-śīlāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:535: brahma-bhavanād iti pāṭhe bhavanaṃ vāsa-sthānam iti sa evārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:537: kiṃ tadvad eva tvāṃ prāptānām api punar āvṛttir nety āha mām īśvaram ekam upetya tu |
GE07bhg4c08u:539: mām eva prāpya nirvṛttānāṃ he kaunteya mātṛto 'pi prasiddha-mahānubhāva punar-janma na vidyate punar-āvṛttir nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:540: atrārjuna kaunteyeti sambodhana-dvayena svarūpataḥ kāraṇataś ca śuddhir jñāna-saṃpattaye sūcitā |
GE07bhg4c08u:542: ye krama-mukti-phalābhirupāsanābhir brahma-lokaṃ prāptās teṣām eva tatrotpanna-samyag-darśanānāṃ brahmaṇā saha mokṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:543: ye tu pañcāgni-vidyādibhir atat-kratavo 'pi tatra gatās teṣām avaśyambhāvi punar-janma |
GE07bhg4c08u:544: ataeva krama-mukty-abhiprāyeṇa brahma-lokam abhisampadyate na ca punar āvartate,
GE07bhg4c08u:546: itaratra teṣām iha na punar āvṛttiḥ imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante itīhemam iti ca viśeṣaṇād gamanādhikaraṇa-kalpād anyatra punar āvṛttiḥ pratīyate ||16||
GE07bhg4c08u:547: viśvanāthaḥ --- sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante mad-bhaktās tu tavan na jāyanta ity āha ābrahmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:549: baladevaḥ - mad-vimukhās tu karma-viśeṣaiḥ svargādi-lokān prāptā api tebhyaḥ patantīty āha ābrahmeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:551: brahma-lokena saha sarve svargādayo lokās tat-tad-vartino jīvās tat-tat-karma-kṣaye sati punar āvartino bhūmau punar janma labhante |
GE07bhg4c08u:553: atredaṃ bodhyaṃ pañcāgni-vidyayā mahāhava-maraṇādinā ye brahma-lokaṃ gatās teṣāṃ bhogānte pātaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:554: ye tu sa-niṣṭhāḥ pareśa-bhaktāḥ svargādi-lokān krameṇānubhavantas tatra gatās teṣāṃ tu na tasmāt pātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:555: kintu tal-loka-vināśe tat-patinā saha pareśa-loka-prāptir eva -
GE07bhg4c08u:556: brahmaṇā saha te sarve samprāpte pratisañcare |
GE07bhg4c08u:557: parasyānte kṛtātmānaḥ praviśanti paraṃ padam || iti smaraṇād iti ||16||
GE07bhg4c08u:562: śrīdharaḥ - nanu ca tapasvino dāna-śīlā vīta-rāgās titikṣavaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:564: ity ādi purāṇa-vākyais trailokyasya sakāśān maharlokādīnām utkṛṣṭatvaṃ gamyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:565_0: vināśitve ca sarveṣām avaśiṣṭe katham asau viśeṣaḥ syād ity āśaṅkya bahv-alpa-kāla-sthāyitva-nimitto
GE07bhg4c08u:565_1: 'sau viśeṣa ity āśayena sva-mānena śata-varṣāyuṣo brahmaṇo 'hany ahani trilokya utpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:565_2: niśi niśi ca pralayo bhavatīti darśayiṣyan brahmaṇo 'horātrayoḥ pramāṇam āha sahasreti |
GE07bhg4c08u:566: sahasraṃ yugāni paryanto 'vasānaṃ ysya tad brahmaṇo yad ahas tad ye viduḥ yuga-sahasram anto yasyās tāṃ rātriṃ ca yoga-balena ye vidus ta eva sarvajñā janā aho-rātra-vidaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:567: yeṣāṃ tu kevalaṃ candrāditya-gatyaiva jñānaṃ te tathāhorātra-vido na bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:569: yuga-śabdena atra caturyugam abhipretaṃ caturyuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti viṣṇu-purāṇokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:572: manuṣyāṇāṃ yad varṣaṃ tad devānām aho-rātram |
GE07bhg4c08u:573: tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣa-māsādi-kalpanayā dvādaśabhir varṣa-sahasraiś catur-yugaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c08u:575: tāvat parimāṇaiva rātris tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣa-māsādi-krameṇa varṣa-śataṃa brahmaṇaḥ paramāyur iti ||17||
GE07bhg4c08u:576: madhusūdanaḥ - brahma-loka-sahitāḥ sarve lokāḥ punar āvartinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:578: manuṣya-parimāṇena sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ sahasraṃ yugāni catur-yugāni paryanto 'vasānaṃ yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c08u:579: caturyuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti hi paurāṇikaṃ vacanam |
GE07bhg4c08u:580_0: tādṛśaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prajāpater ahar-dinaṃ yad ye viduḥ tathā rātriṃ yuga-sahasrāntāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:580_1: caturyuga-sahasra-paryantāṃ ye vidur ity anuvartate te 'horātra-vidas ta evāho-rātra-vido yogino janāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:581: ye tu candrārka-gatyaiva vidus te nāhorātra-vidaḥ svalpa-darśitvād ity abhiprāyaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c08u:582: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu amṛtaṃ kṣemam abhayaṃ trimūrdhno 'dhāyi mūrdhasu (BhP 2.6.19)
GE07bhg4c08u:583: iti dvitīya-skandhoktyā keṣāṃcin mate brahma-lokasya abhayatva-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:584: sannyāsibhir api jagamiṣitatvāt tatratyānāṃ pāto na sambhāvyate ? maivaṃ |
GE07bhg4c08u:585: tal-loka-svāmino brahmaṇo 'pi pātaḥ syāt kim utānyeṣām iti vyañjayann āha sahasra iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:586: sahasraṃ yugāni paryanto 'vasānaṃ yasya tad brahmaṇo 'har dinaṃ yad ye śāstrābhijñā vidur jānanti te 'ho-rātra-vido janā rātrim api tasya yuga-sahasrāntāṃ viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:587: tena tādṛśāho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-krameṇa varṣa-śataṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāyur iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:588: etad-ante tasyāpi pāto na kasyacid vaiṣṇavasya tasya brahmaṇo mokṣaś ceti vyañjitam ||17||
GE07bhg4c08u:589: baladevaḥ - svargādayaḥ satyāntāḥ sarve lokāḥ kāla-paricchinnatvād vinaśyantīti bhāvenāha sahasreti |
GE07bhg4c08u:590: yad ye brahmaṇaś caturmukhasyāhar dinaṃ nṛ-māṇena sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ viduḥ catur-yuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:592: tasya rātriṃ ca caturyuga-sahasrāntāṃ vidus ta eva yogino janā aho-rātra-vido bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:593: na tv anye candrārka-gati-vido mahar-lokādi-sthitānām upalakṣaṇam etat |
GE07bhg4c08u:594_0: ayam arthaḥ nṝṇāṃ varṣaṃ devānām aho-rātraṃ tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-gaṇanayā
GE07bhg4c08u:594_1: dvādaśabhri varṣa-sahasraiś catur-yugaṃ catur-yugānāṃ sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:594_2: rātriś ca tāvaty eva tādṛśaiś cāho-rātraiḥ pakṣādi-gaṇanayā varṣa-śataṃ tasya paramāyur iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:601: śrīdharaḥ - tatra kim ? ata āha avyaktād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:603: tasmād avyaktāt kāraṇa-rūpād vyajyanta iti vyaktayaś carācarāṇi bhūtāni prādurbhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:607: yad vā te 'horātra-vida ity etan na vidhīyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:608: kintu te prasiddhā ahorātra-vido janā brahmaṇo yad ahar vidus tasyāhna āgame 'vyaktād vyaktayaḥ prabhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:609: yāṃ ca rātriṃ vidus tasyā rātrer āgame pralīyante iti dvayor anvayaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c08u:610: madhusūdanaḥ - yathoktair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-gaṇanayā pūrṇaṃ varṣa-śataṃ prajāpateḥ paramāyur iti kāla-paricchinnatvenānityo 'sau |
GE07bhg4c08u:612: ye tu tato 'rvācīnās teṣāṃ tad ahar-mātra-paricchinnatvāt tat-tal-lokebhyaḥ punar-āvṛttir iti kim u vaktavyam ity āha avyaktād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:613: atra dainandina-sṛṣṭi-pralayor eva vaktum upakrāntatvāt tatra cākāśādīnāṃ sattvād avyakta-śabdenākhyākṛtāvasthā nocyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:616: ahar-āgame prajāpateḥ prabodha-samaye 'vyaktāt tat-svāpāvasthā-rūpād vyaktayaḥ śarīra-viṣayādi-rūpā bhoga-bhūtayaḥ prabhavanti vyavahāra-kṣamatayā 'bhivyajyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:617: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-kāle pūrvoktāḥ sarvā api vyaktayaḥ pralīyante tiro-bhavanti yata āvirbhūtās tatraivāvyakta-saṃjñake
GE07bhg4c08u:619: viśvanāthaḥ --- ye tu tato 'rvācīnās triloka-sthās teṣāṃ tu tasyāhany ahany api pāta ity āha avyaktād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:620: atra dainandina-sṛṣṭi-pralayayor ākāśādīnāṃ sattvād avyakta-śabdena svāpāvasthaḥ prajāpatir evocyate iti madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:621: tataś ca avyaktāt svāpāvasthāt prajāpateḥ sakāśād vyaktayaḥ śarīra-viṣayādi-rūpā bhoga-bhūmayo bhavanti vyavahāra-kṣamāḥ syuḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:622: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-kāle pralīyante tasminn eva tirobhavanti ||18||
GE07bhg4c08u:623: baladevaḥ -- ye tu tasmād arvācīnās trilokī-vartinas teṣāṃ brahmaṇo dine pātaḥ syād ity āha avyaktād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:624: ahar-āgame brahmaṇo jāgara-samaye avyaktāt svāpāvasthāt tasmāt sarvā śarīrendriya-bhogya-bhoga-sthāna-rūpā vyaktayaḥ prabhavanty utpadyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:625: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-samaye tatraiva brahmaṇy avyakta-saṃjñake svāpāvasthe kāraṇe tāḥ pralīyante tirobhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:631: bhūta-grāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:633: śrīdharaḥ - atra ca kṛta-nāśākṛtābhyāgama-śaṅkāṃ vārayan vairāgyārthaṃ sṛṣṭi-praylaya-pravāhasyāvicchedaṃ darśayati bhūta-grāma iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:636: yaḥ prāg āsīt sa evāyam ahar-āgame bhūtvā bhūtvā rātrer āgame pralīyante pralīya pralīya punar apy ahar-āgame 'vaśaḥ karmādi-paratantraḥ san prabhavati nānya ity arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c08u:637: madhusūdanaḥ - evam āśu-vināśitve 'pi saṃsāra-stha na nivṛttiḥ kleśa-karmādibhir avaśatayā punaḥ punaḥ prādurbhāvāt prādurbhūtasya ca punaḥ kleśādi-vaśenaiva tirobhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:638_0: saṃsāre viparivartamānānāṃ sarveṣām api prāṇinām asvātantryād avaśānām eva janma-maraṇādi-duḥkha-prabandha-sambandhād
GE07bhg4c08u:638_1: alam anena saṃsāreṇeti-vairāgyotpatty-arthaṃ samāna-nāma-rūpatvena ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:639: bhūta-grāmo bhūta-samudāyaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇo yaḥ pūrvasmin kalpe sthitaḥ sa evāyam etasmin kalpe jāyamāno 'pi na tu pratikalpam anyo 'nyac ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:642: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam atho suvaḥ || iti śruteḥ | (MahānārāyaṇaU 1.65)
GE07bhg4c08u:643: samāna-nāma-rūpatvād āvṛttāv apy avirodhau darśanāt smṛteś ca (Vs 1.3.30) iti nyāyāc ca |
GE07bhg4c08u:646: viśvanāthaḥ --- evam eva bhūtānāṃ carācara-prāṇināṃ grāmaḥ samūhaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c08u:647: baladevaḥ - ye pralīnās te punar na bhaviṣyantīti kṛta-hānyākṛtābhyāgama-śaṅkā syāt tāṃ nirasyann āha bhūteti |
GE07bhg4c08u:648: bhūta-grāmaḥ sthira-cara-prāṇi-samūho 'vaśaḥ karmādhīnaḥ san tathā cedṛśa-janma-mṛtyu-pravāha-saṅkule prapañce 'smin vivekināṃ vairāgyaṃ yuktam ity uktam ||19||
GE07bhg4c08u:652: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:653: śrīdharaḥ - lokānām anityatvaṃ prapañcya parameśvara-svarūpasya nityatvaṃ prapañcayati - para iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c08u:654: tasmāc carācara-kāraṇa-bhūtād avyaktāt paras tasyāpi kāraṇa-bhūto yo 'nyas tad-vilakṣaṇo 'vyaktaś cakṣur-ādy-agocaro bhāvaḥ sanātano 'nādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:655: sa tu sarveṣu kārya-kāraṇa-lakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu naśyatv api na vinaśyati ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:656_1: āvartina ity etad vyākhyātam adhunā mām upetya punar janma na vidyata ity etad vyācaṣṭe
GE07bhg4c08u:657: tasmāc carācara-sthūla-prapañca-kāraṇa-bhūtād dhiraṇyagarbhākhyād avyaktāt paro vyatiriktaḥ śreṣṭho vā tasyāpi kāraṇa-bhūtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:658: vyatireke 'pi sālakṣaṇyaṃ syād iti nety āha-anyo 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇaḥ na tasya pratimā asti iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:659: avyakto rūpādi-hīnatayā cakṣur-ādy-agocaro bhāvaḥ kalpiteṣu sarveṣu kāryeṣu sad-rūpeṇānugataḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:661: tu-śabdo heyād anityād avyaktād upādeyatvaṃ ntiyasyāvyaktasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ sūcayati |
GE07bhg4c08u:662: etādṛśo yo bhāvaḥ sa hiraṇyagarbha iva sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsv api na vinaśyati utpadyamāneṣv api notpadyata ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:663: | hiraṇyagarbhasya tu kāryasya bhūtābhimānitvāt tad-utpatti-vināśābhyāṃ yuktāv evotpatti-vināśau na tu tad-anabhimānino 'kāryasya parameśvarasyeti bhāvaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:664: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmād ukta-lakṣaṇād avyaktāt prajāpater hiraṇyagarbhāt sakāśāt paraḥ śreṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:665: hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi kāraṇabhūto yo 'nyaḥ khalv avyakto bhāvaḥ sanātano 'nādiḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:666: baladevaḥ - tad evaṃ karma-tantrāṇāṃ janma-vināśa-darśanena ābrahma-bhuvanāt ity etad vivṛtam |
GE07bhg4c08u:667: atha mām upetyaitad vivṛṇoti paras tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:668: tasmād utka-rūpād avyaktād brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhād anyo yo bhāvaḥ padārthaḥ paraḥ śreṣṭhas tato 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇas tasyopāsya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:671: prasāditas tu pratyakṣo 'pi bhavatīty uktaṃ prāk |
GE07bhg4c08u:673: sa khalu hiraṇyagarbha-paryanteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu na vinaśyati ||20||
GE07bhg4c08u:676: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c08u:677: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:678: śrīdharaḥ - avināśe pramāṇaṃ darśayann āha avyakta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:681: tathākṣarāt saṃbhavatīha viśvaṃ ity ādi-śrutiṣv akṣara ity uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:682: taṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ gamyaṃ puruṣārtham āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:683: puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ ity-ādi-śrutayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:684: parama-gatitvam evāha yaṃ prāpya na nivartanta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:688: ato 'ham eva paramā gatir ity arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:689: madhusūdanaḥ - yo bhāva ihāvyakta ity akṣara iti cokto 'nyatrāpi śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca taṃ bhāvam āhuḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaś ca puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ ity ādyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:691: yaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpya na punar nivartante saṃsārāya tad-dhāma svarūpaṃ mama viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c08u:692: mama dhāmeti rāhoḥ śira itivad bheda-kalpanayā ṣaṣṭhī |
GE07bhg4c08u:693: ato 'ham eva paramā gatir ity arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:694: viśvanāthaḥ --- pūrvokta-ślokoktam avyakta-śabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe avyakta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:695: na kṣaratīty akṣaro nārāyaṇaḥ eko nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:697: yad vā akṣaraḥ paraṃ dhāma brahmaiva mad-dhāma mat-tejo-rūpam ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:698: baladevaḥ -- yo bhāvo mayehāvyakta ity akṣara iti cocyate taṃ vedāntāḥ paramāṃ gatim āhuḥ puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c08u:699: yaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpyopetya janāḥ punar na nivartante janma nāpnuvanti sa bhāvo 'ham evety āha tad iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:700: tan mamaiva dhāma svarūpaṃ paramaṃ śrīmat ṣaṣṭhīyaṃ caitanyam ātmanaḥ svarūpam itivad avagantavyā ||21||
GE07bhg4c08u:703: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā |
GE07bhg4c08u:704: yasyāntaḥ-sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam ||22||
GE07bhg4c08u:705: śrīdharaḥ - tat-prāptau ca bhaktir antaraṅgopāya ity uktam evety āha puruṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:707: na vidyate 'nyaḥ śaraṇatvena yasyāṃ tayaikānta-bhaktyaiva labhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:709: paratvam evāha yasya kāraṇa-bhūtasyāntar-madhye bhūtāni sthitāni |
GE07bhg4c08u:710: yena ca kāraṇa-bhūtenedaṃ sarvaṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptam ||22||
GE07bhg4c08u:711: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīm ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ tasyāhaṃ sulabhaḥ iti prāg uktaṃ bhakti-yogam eva tat-prāpty-upāyam āha puruṣa sa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:712: sa paro niratiśayaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmāham evānanyayā na vidyate 'nyho viṣayo yasyāṃ tayā prema-lakṣaṇayā bhaktyaiva labhyo nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c08u:713: sa ka ity apekṣāyām āha yasya purusasyāntaḥ-sthāny antarvartīni bhūtāni sarvāṇi kāryāṇi kāraṇāntarvartitvāt kāryasya |
GE07bhg4c08u:714: ataeva yena puruṣeṇa sarvam idaṃ kārya-jātaṃ tataṃ vyāptam -
GE07bhg4c08u:715: yasmāt paraṃ nāparam asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit |
GE07bhg4c08u:716: vṛkṣa eva stabdho divi tisṭhaty ekas tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam |
GE07bhg4c08u:717: yat kiṃcit jagat sarvaṃ dṛśyate śrūyate 'pi vā |
GE07bhg4c08u:718: antar bahiś ca tat sarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c08u:720: viśvanāthaḥ --- sa ca mad-aṃśaḥ paramaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:722: ataeva pūrvaṃ mayoktaṃ ananya-cetāḥ satatam iti bhāvaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c08u:723: baladevaḥ -- at-prāptau bhakteḥ sūpāyatvam āha puruṣaḥ sa iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:724: sa mal-lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣo 'nanyayā tad-ekāntayā ananya-cetāḥ satatam iti pūrvoditayā bhaktyaiva labhyo labdhuṃ śakyo yoga-bhaktyā tu duḥśakyā tat-prāptir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:726: sarvam idaṃ jagat yena tataṃ vyāptam | śrutiś caivam āha-
GE07bhg4c08u:729: vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekas
GE07bhg4c08u:730: tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam || ity ādyā ||22||
GE07bhg4c08u:733: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:734: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha ||23||
GE07bhg4c08u:735: śrīdharaḥ - tad evaṃ paramśvaropāsakās tat-padaṃ prāpya na nivartante |
GE07bhg4c08u:740: yatra yasmin kāle prayātā yogino 'nāvṛttiṃ yānti yasmiṃś ca kāle prayātā āvṛttiṃ yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmīty anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:741_0: atra ca raśmy-anusārī ataś cāyane 'pi dakṣiṇe iti sūcita-nyāyenottarāyaādi-kāla-viśeṣa-maraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:741_1: ca tv avivakṣitatvāt kāla-śabdena kālābhimāninībhir ātivāhikībhir devatābhiḥ prāpyo mārga upalakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:742: ato 'yam arthaḥ yasmin kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣite mārge prayātā yogina upāsakāḥ karmiṇaś ca yathākramam anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti |
GE07bhg4c08u:745: aharādi-śabdoktānāṃ kālābhimānitvāt tat-sāhacaryād āmra-vanam ity ādivat kāla-śabdenopalakṣaṇam aviruddham ||23||
GE07bhg4c08u:746: madhusūdanaḥ - saguṇa-brahmopāsakās tat-padaṃ prāpya na nivartante kintu krameṇa mucyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:747: tatra tal-loka-bhogāt prāg-anutpanna-samyag-darśanānāṃ tesāṃ mārgāpekṣā vidyate na tu samyag-darśinām iva tad-anapekṣety upāsakānāṃ tal-loka-prāptaye deva-yāna-mārga upadiśyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:749: prāṇotkramaṇānantaraṃ yatra yasmin kāle kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣite mārge prayātā yogino dhyāyinaḥ karmiṇaś cānāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti |
GE07bhg4c08u:750: deva-yāne pathi prayātāś ca karmiṇa āvṛttiṃ yānti |
GE07bhg4c08u:751: yadyapi deva-yāne 'pi pathi prayātāḥ punar āvartante ity uktaṃ ābrahma-bhuvanā lokāḥ punar āvartinaḥ ity atra,
GE07bhg4c08u:752: tathāpi pitṛ-yāne pathi gatā āvartanta eva na ke 'pi tatra krama-mukti-bhājaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:753_0: deva-yāne pathi gatās tu yadyapi kecid āvartante pratīkopāsakās taḍil-loka-paryantaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:753_1: gatā hiraṇyagarbha-paryantam amānava-puruṣa-nītā api pañcāgni-vidyādy-upāsakā atat-kratavo
GE07bhg4c08u:753_2: bhogānte nivartanta eva tathāpi daharādy-upāsakāḥ krameṇa mucyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:757: atipraśasta iti stutir upapadyate keṣāṃcid āvṛttāv apy anāvṛtti-phalatvasyānapāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:758: taṃ deva-yānaṃ pitṛ-yānaṃ ca kālaṃ kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣitaṃ mārgaṃ vakṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c08u:759_0: he bharatarṣabha ! atra kāla-śabdasya mukhyārthatve 'gnir-jyotir-dhūma-śabdānām upapattir
GE07bhg4c08u:759_1: gati-sṛti-śabdayoś ceti tad-anurodhenaikasmin kāla-pada eva lakṣaṇāśritā kālābhimāni-devatānāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:760: agni-dhūmayos tad-itarayoḥ sator api agnihotra-śabdavad eka-deśenāpy upalakṣaṇaṃ kāla-śabdena |
GE07bhg4c08u:761: anyathā prātar agni-devatāyā abhāvāt tat-prakhyaṃ cānya-śāstram (ṃī.da 1.4.4)
GE07bhg4c08u:762: ity anena tasya nāma-dheyatayā na syāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:764: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama iti tva-uktyā tvad-bhaktās tvāṃ prāptā na punar āvartanta ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:765: na tatra tva-prāntau kaścin mārga-niyama ity uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:766: tvad-bhaktānāṃ ca guṇātītatvāt tan-mārgo 'pi guṇātīta eva avasīyate, na tu sāttviko 'rcir-ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:767: yas tu mārgo yogino jñāninaḥ karmiṇaś cāsti tam ahaṃ jijñāse ity apekṣāyām āha yatreti |
GE07bhg4c08u:768: prāṇotkramaṇānantaraṃ tatra kālopalakṣite mārge prayātā anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti taṃ kālaṃ mārgaṃ vakṣya ity anvayaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c08u:769: baladevaḥ -- sva-bhaktānām āvṛttiḥ sva-vimukhānāṃ tv āvṛttir uktā |
GE07bhg4c08u:770: sā sā ca kena pathā gatānāṃ bhaved ity apekṣāyām āha yatreti |
GE07bhg4c08u:773_0: agni-dhūmayoḥ kālatvābhāvāt kāla-śabdenoktis tu bhūyasā mahad-ādi-śabdānāṃ rātry-ādi-śabdānāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:773_1: ca kāla-vācitvāt tathā cārcir-ādibhir dhūmādibhiś ca devaiḥ pālitaḥ panthāḥ kāla-śabdenokto bodhyaḥ ||23 ||
GE07bhg4c08u:776: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam |
GE07bhg4c08u:777: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido janāḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c08u:779: agni-jyotiḥ-śabdābhyāṃ te 'rcir abhisambhavanti iti śruty-uktārcir-abhimāninī devatopalakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:783: etac cānyāsām api śruty-uktānāṃ saṃvatsara devalokādi-devatānam upalakṣaṇārtham |
GE07bhg4c08u:784: evaṃ bhūto yo mārgas tatra prayātā gatā bhagavad-upāsakā janā brahma prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:786: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇ-māsānudaṅṅāditya eti māsebhyo deva-lokam iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:787: na hi sadyo-mukti-bhājāṃ samyag-darśana-niṣṭhānāṃ gatir vā kvacid asti,
GE07bhg4c08u:789: madhusūdanaḥ - tatropāsakānāṃ deva-yānaṃ panthānam āha agnir iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:790: agnir-jyotir ity arcir abhimāninī devatā lakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:791_0: ahar ity ahar-abhimāninī śukla-pakṣa iti śukla-pakṣābhimāninī ṣaṇ-māsā uttarāyaṇam
GE07bhg4c08u:791_1: iti uttarāyaṇa-rūpa-ṣaṇmāsābhimāninī devataiva lakṣyate ātivāhikās tal-liṅgāt (MD 4.3.4) iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:792: etac cānyāsām api śruty-uktānāṃ devatānam upalakṣaṇārtham |
GE07bhg4c08u:793_0: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād
GE07bhg4c08u:793_1: yān ṣaḍ-uṅṅeti māsāṃs tān māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarād ādityam ādityāc candramasaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:793_2: candramaso vidyutaṃ tat-puruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayaty eṣa deva-patho brahma-patha
GE07bhg4c08u:793_3: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:794: atra śruty-antarānusārāt saṃvatsarānantaraṃ deva-loka-devatā tato vāyu-devatā tata āditya ity ākare nirṇītam |
GE07bhg4c08u:797: saṃvatsaro deva-loko vāyur ādityaś candramā vidyud-varuṇa indraḥ prajāpatiś cety anuktā api draṣṭavyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:798: tatra deva-yāna-mārge prayātā gacchanti brahma kāryopādhikaṃ kāryaṃ vādarir asya gaty-upapatteḥ (Vs 4.3.7) iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:801: atra etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartanta iti śrutāv imam iti viśeṣaṇāt kalpāntare kecid āvartanta iti pratīyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:804: agni-jyotiḥ-śabdābhyāṃ te 'rciṣam abhisambhavanti iti śruty-uktyārcir-abhimāninī devatopalakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c08u:808: etad-rūpo yo mārgas tatra prayātā brahma-vido jñānino brahma prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:809: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇ-māsānudaṅṅāditya eti mālebhyo deva-lokam iti ||24||
GE07bhg4c08u:812: ahar iti divasābhimānī śukla iti śukla-pakṣābhimāninī |

GE07bhg4c08u:815_1: arciṣo 'haraha āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣādyān ṣaḍ-udaṇṇeti māsāṃs tān māsebhyaḥ

GE07bhg4c08u:816: asyārthaḥ - asminn akṣi-stha-brahmopāsaka-gaṇe mṛte sati yadi putra-śiṣyādayaḥ śabyaṃ śaba-sambandhi karma dāhādi kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:818: ubhayathāpy akṣatopāsti-phalās te tad-upāsakā arcir-ādibhir devais tam upāsyaṃ prayāntīti sphuṭam anyat |
GE07bhg4c08u:820: vidyutaḥ paratra kramād varuṇendra- prajāpatayo bodhyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:823: ete 'rcir-ādayo devā ity āha sūtra-kāraḥ - ātivāhikās tal-liṅgāt (Vs 4.3.4) iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:824: tathārcir-ādibhir bhagavan-nideśa-sthair dvādaśabhir devaiḥ sevyamānena pathā bhagavantaṃ tad-bhaktāḥ prayānti tataḥ punar nāvartanta iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:827: vidhu-vidyud-varuṇndra-druhiṇaiś cāgāt padaṃ harer muktaḥ || iti ||24||
GE07bhg4c08u:830: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam |
GE07bhg4c08u:831: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:834: rātry-ādi-śabdaiś ca pūrvavad eva rātri-kṛṣṇa-pakṣa-dakṣiṇāyana-rūpa-ṣaṇ-māsābhimāninyas tisro devatā upalakṣyante |
GE07bhg4c08u:835: etābhir devatābhir upalakṣito yo mārgas tatra prayātaḥ karma-yogī cāndramasaṃ jyotis tad-upalakṣitaṃ svarga-lokaṃ prāpya tatreṣṭāpūrta-karma-phalaṃ bhuktvā punar āvartate |
GE07bhg4c08u:836_0: tatrāpi śrutiḥ-te dhūmam abhi sambhavanti dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apakṣīyamāṇa-pakṣam
GE07bhg4c08u:836_1: apakṣīyamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇmāsān dakṣiṇāditya eti māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ pitṛ-lokāt
GE07bhg4c08u:836_2: candraṃ te candraṃ prāpya annaṃ bhavanti iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:837: tad evaṃ nivṛtti-karma-sahitopāsanayā krama-muktiḥ kāmya-karmabhiś ca svarga-bhogānantaram āvṛttiḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:839: | kṣudra-karmaṇāṃ tu jantūnām atraiva punaḥ punar janmeti draṣṭavyam ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:840: madhusūdanaḥ - deva-yāna-mārgastuty-arthaṃ pitṛ-yāna-mārgam āha dhūma iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:841: atrāpi dhūma iti dhūmābhimāninī devatā rātrir iti rātry-abhimāninī kṛṣṇa iti kṛṣṇa-pakṣābhimāninī |
GE07bhg4c08u:842: ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam iti dakṣiṇāyanābhimāninī lakṣyate etad apy anyāsāṃ śruty-uktānām upalakṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c08u:843_0: tathā hi śrutiḥ -- te dhūmam abhi sambhavanti dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apara-pakṣam apara-kṣīyamāṇa-pakṣād
GE07bhg4c08u:843_1: yān ṣaḍ-dakṣiṇaiti māsāṃs tān anite saṃvatsaram abhiprāpnuvanti māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:843_2: pitṛ-lokād ākāśam ākāśāc candramasam eṣa somo rājā tad-devānām annaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti
GE07bhg4c08u:843_3: tasmin yāvat saṃpātam uṣitvāthaitam evādhvyānaṃ punar nivartante iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:844: tatra tasmin pathi prayātāś cāndramasaṃ jyotiḥ phalaṃ yogī karma-yogīṣṭāpūrta-datta-kārī
GE07bhg4c08u:847: tasmād etasmād āvṛtti-mārgād anāvṛtti-mārgaḥ śreyān ity arthaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:848: viśvanāthaḥ --- karmiṇām āvṛtti-mārgam āha dhūma iti |

GE07bhg4c08u:851: etābhir devatābhir upalakṣito yo mārgas tatra prayātaḥ karma-yogī cāndramasaṃ jyotis tad-upalakṣitaṃ svarga-lokaṃ prāpya karma-phalaṃ bhuktvā nivartate ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:852: baladevaḥ - athāvṛtti-patham āha dhūmo rātrir iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:855: chāndogyāḥ paṭhanti - atha ya ime grāma iṣṭā-pūrte dattam ity upāsate te dhūmam abhisambhavanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:856: dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apara-pakṣam apara-pakṣādyān ṣaḍ-dakṣiṇaiti māsāṃs tān naite saṃvatsaram abhiprāpnuvanti ||
GE07bhg4c08u:857: māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ pitṛ-lokād ākāśam ākāśāc candramasam eṣa somo rājā tad devānām annaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti |
GE07bhg4c08u:858: tasmin yavāt saṃpātam uṣitvāthaitam evādhvānaṃ punar nivartante (5.10.3-5) iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:859: tathā ca dhūmādibhiḥ pareśa-nideśasthair aṣṭabhir devaiḥ pālitena pathā kāmya-karmiṇaś candra-lokaṃ pāpya bhoga-kṣaye sati tasmāt punar nivartanta iti ||25||
GE07bhg4c08u:862: śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate |
GE07bhg4c08u:866: ete gatī mārgau jñāna-karmādhikāriṇo jagataḥ śāśvate anādī saṃmate saṃsārasyānāditvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:867: tayor ekayā śuklayā anāvṛttiṃ mokṣaṃ yāti |
GE07bhg4c08u:869: madhusūdanaḥ - uktau mārgāv upasaṃharati śukla-kṛṣṇe iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:872: te ete śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī mārgau hi prasiddhe sa-guṇa-vidyā-karmādhikāriṇoḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:873: jagataḥ sarvasyāpi śāstra-jñasya śāśvate anādī mate saṃsārasyānāditvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:874: tayor ekayā śuklayā yāty anāvṛttiṃ kaścit |
GE07bhg4c08u:876: viśvanāthaḥ --- uktau mārgāv upasaṃharati śukla-kṛṣṇe iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:878: ekayā śuklayā anāvṛttiṃ mokṣam anyayā kṛṣṇayā tu punaḥ punar atra jāyate ||26||
GE07bhg4c08u:880: arcir-ādir gatiḥ śuklā prakāśa-mayatvāt dhūmādikā gatiḥ kṛṣṇā prakāśa-śūnyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:881: gatiḥ panthā ete gatā jñāna-karmādhikāriṇo jagataḥ śāśvate anādī sammate tasyānāditvāt |
GE07bhg4c08u:885: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana |
GE07bhg4c08u:887: śrīdharaḥ - mārga-jñāna-kalaṃ darśayan bhakti-yogam upasaṃharati naite iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:888: ete sṛtī mārgau mokṣa-saṃsāra-prāpakau jānan kaścid api yogī na muhyati |
GE07bhg4c08u:892: madhusūdanaḥ - gater upāsyatvāya tad-vijñānaṃ stauti naite iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:893_0: ete sṛtī mārgau he pārtha jana krama-mokṣāyaikā punaḥ saṃsārāyāpareti niścinvan yogī
GE07bhg4c08u:893_1: dhyāna-niṣṭho na muhyati kevalaṃ karma dhūmādi-mārga-prāpakaṃ kartavyatvena na pratyeti
GE07bhg4c08u:894: tasmād yogasthāpunar-āvṛtti-phalatvāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yoga-yuktaḥ samāhita-citto bhavāpunar-āvṛttaye he 'rjuna ||27||
GE07bhg4c08u:895: viśvanāthaḥ --- etan-mārga-dvaya-jñānaṃ vivekotpādakam atas tadvantaṃ stauti naite iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:897: baladevaḥ -- etayoḥ pathor bodho viveka-hetur bhavatīti taṃ stauti naita iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:898: sṛtī panthāno jānan arcir-ādi-mokṣāya dhūmādiḥ saṃsārāyeti smaran kaścid api yogī mad-bhakto na muhyati dhūmādi-prāpakaṃ karma kartavyatvena na niścinotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:906: śrīdharaḥ - adhyāyārtham aṣṭa-praśnārtha-nirṇayaṃ saphalam upasaṃharati vedeṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:911: yat puṇya-phalam upadiṣṭaṃ śāstreṣu tat sarvam atyeti |
GE07bhg4c08u:913: kiṃ kṛtvā ? idam aṣṭa-praśnārtha-nirṇayenoktaṃ tattvaṃ viditvā |
GE07bhg4c08u:914: tataś ca yogī jñānī bhūtvā param utkṛṣṭam ādyaṃ jagan mūla-bhūtaṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ prāpnoti ||28||
GE07bhg4c08u:919: madhusūdanaḥ - punaḥ śraddhānu-vṛddhy-arthaṃ yogaṃ stauti vedeṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c08u:923: dāneṣu tulā-puruṣādiṣu deśe kāle pātre ca śraddhayā samyag-dattesu yat-puṇya-phalaṃ puṇyasya dharmasya phalaṃ svarga-svārājyādi pradiṣṭaṃ śāstreṇa |
GE07bhg4c08u:924: atyety atikrāmati tat sarvam idaṃ pūrvokta-sapta-praśna-nirūpaṇa-dvāreṇoktaṃ viditvā samyag-anuṣṭhāna-prayantam avadhāryānuṣṭhāya ca yogī dhyāna-niṣṭhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:925: na kevalaṃ tad atikrāmati paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭam aiśvaraṃ sthānam ādyaṃ sarva-kāraṇam upaiti ca pratipadyate ca sarva-kāraṇaṃ brahmaiva prāpnotīty
GE07bhg4c08u:926: arthaḥ | tad anenādhyāyena dhyeyatvena tat-padārtho vyākhyātaḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c08u:929: tat sarvam atyeti atikramya ca yogī bhaktimān tato 'pi śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam ādyam aprākṛtaṃ nityaṃ prāpnoti ||28||
GE07bhg4c08u:930: bhaktānāṃ sarvataḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ teṣv api sphuṭam |
GE07bhg4c08u:937: dāneṣu deśa-kāla-pātra-parīkṣayā śraddhayā ca samyag-datteṣu yat puṇya-phalaṃ svarga-rājyādi-lakṣaṇaṃ pradiṣṭam uktam |
GE07bhg4c08u:940: idam adhyāya-dvayoktaṃ bhagavato mama mad-bhakteś ca māhātmyaṃ sat-prasaṅgena viditvā tad-vedana-sukhātiriktaṃ tat sarvaṃ tṛṇāya manyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c08u:941: tato yogī mad-bhaktimān bhūtvādyam anādi-parama-māyikaṃ mat-sthānam upaiti ||28||
